title: Connection issues = leaverbuster rito pls :/
body: So in the last week i left games 2-3 times (once caused a remake and others we're temporary issues, 20-30 seconds). Now leaver buster stuck me with 20 minute wait times, but it's not my  fault i hit ping spikes :/ . Somebody from riot halp pls. Like 5 minutes I could understand, but 20 minutes? I havent afk'd in ages. Somebody help :o

replies.body:
Regardless of intention, disconnections negatively impact everyone in the match. This is a big reason why all disconnections are treated equally and why penalties cannot be modified in any way.

Most connection issues are caused by network settings that are incompatible with League. To resolve this, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it covers the most common solutions.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
Well, the best solution I can think of is to get a better connection. If you aren't using wired then you should try it out, it might work better. Maybe ask your ISP why your internet is being bad.
